|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 580 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = ESMT;F59L1G81A-25T; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = |ram1chip = Nanya;NT6TU64M16GG-AC; |ram1_num = 128 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, EP1467.4B, 13<..>, TAIWAN; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 80:37:73 |oui = 80:37:73 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink UBoot Version:4.1.1.0; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;MTK APSoC; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes, internal, 4-pin header, populated, 3.3V TTL, (57600 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = NETGEARXX |defaultssid_regex = ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_ch = |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/30/2014 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 606449104158 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00KFD0O0I |asin_country = US |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7610E;MT7610EN, 1302-AMAL, DTPNP853; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 433 |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The FCC docs ''seem'' to indicate.. *Two models are covered by this FCC ID - the R6050 and JR6150 *This router is using a '''MediaTek''' platform *The manufacturer may possibly be '''DNI''' no, per the images below it's a '''SerComm''' manuf'ed unit {{FCC ST|11/24/2014|indexme.}} ==Links of Interest== *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?t=18054 On the '''SmallNetBuilder''' Forums] :'''mediatrek''' notes internal images of the JR6150 are available [http://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/44-netgear-jr6150/ @ openitforum.pl] ::Specifications are per these images. ::"AM100C-1.6MM" and "JR6150" is silkscreened on the board shown. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== *''Note'': Headers might not be populated as seen [http://www.openitforum.pl/uploads/gallery/album_44/gallery_1_44_172755.jpg here] 
(Gnd)  (Tx) (3.3 Vcc) (Rx)
pin4  pin3  pin2  pin1 <
{| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Speed ! Bits ! Stop Bits ! Parity ! Flow Control |- | 57600 | 8 | 1 | None | None |} {{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
